remarks: Any segment ` A B ` can be extended to a point ` x ` such that ` B x ` is congruent to ` C D ` .  Axiom A4 of [Schwabhauser] p. 11. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 4-Jun-2013.)
statement:
axsegcon $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> E. x e. ( EE ` N ) ( B Btwn <. A , x >. /\ <. B , x >. Cgr <. C , D >. ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d N x $.
